name: IntelliQuilter Pattern
summary: An IQP file contains a quilt pattern that can be used with IntelliQuilter, an add-on for long-arm and mid-arm quilting machines. After transferring an IQP file to the IntelliQuilter tablet, users can open, edit, and use the pattern it contains. IQP files are saved in a proprietary file format, and thus can be opened only with IntelliQuilter.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Transfer to patterns directory on USB flash drive; import into IntelliQuilter tablet
